title: 14 day ban for this? Can I have it removed?

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Banned for this?

body:
I got a 14 day ban for this, where I am not even toxic. Usually when people post that they've gotten a 14-day ban, there's examples from 3-4 matches. As you can see from the imgur link I posted, there was only provided chat logs from a single game I played and the things I wrote was deemed 'unacceptable behaviour'. This does not make sense as I am literally not being toxic.

I wrote ''ggwp'' after missing two CS in botlane. Is that unacceptable behaviour? 

I wrote 'jesus ******g christ' 'loool' 'LOOOL' after my team and I failed to chase the enemy Jinx, where the Katarina on my team flashed over the wall at dragon, hit the Blast Cone and went right back over the wall she flashed. The whole team found this funny and I do not understand why I would be punished for having fun and not taking the game too seriously.

The rest of the logs are basic in-game logs I deem pointless and definitely not toxic in this situation, so I will not address them.

Having all my honor removed as a consequence of a misunderstood situation in this case is really unfortunate for me. 

If there's anything that can be done, I would be really happy.




Game 1
In-Game
makeemrun: don't
makeemrun: shove
makeemrun: ggwp
makeemrun: don't
makeemrun: shove
makeemrun: please
makeemrun: jesus fucking chrsit
makeemrun: loool
makeemrun: LOOOL
makeemrun: if this kata didn't ban my ez i would be as fed as heca :')
makeemrun: yes, i do
makeemrun: go solo baron

replies.body: This seems odd, and I didn't see anything in your match history on op.gg that would suggest griefing. Assuming you're being truthful here I would highly recommend filing a support ticket and seeing if they can help you out here.
Thanks, and yes I did. Hoping for an answer tomorrow.

> [{quoted}](name=makeemrun,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2020-01-15T02:52:51.997+0000)
>
> Thanks, and yes I did. Hoping for an answer tomorrow.

Good luck!

but then why would his teammates report him and why would he say this

>makeemrun: if this kata didn't ban my ez i would be as fed as heca :')
makeemrun: yes, i do
makeemrun: go solo baron

If it was "for fun"

> [{quoted}](name=Chainman3,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2020-01-15T19:26:59.182+0000)
>
> but then why would his teammates report him and why would he say this
> makeemrun: yes, i do
> makeemrun: go solo baron
> 
> If it was "for fun"

Can't say as I wasn't in that game. Maybe they were salty over a loss or something and decided to report out of spite. Maybe there's more to the story than we're being told. Hopefully Riot Support can elaborate on this provided the OP posts the response unedited.

His team won tho. I think theres more to the story which hes holding back intentionally. 

Sidenote: I didnt downvote you idk who did but ill upvote it back to 1.

> [{quoted}](name=Chainman3,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=0005000100000000,timestamp=2020-01-15T19:53:26.390+0000)
>
> His team won tho. I think theres more to the story which hes holding back intentionally. 

That possibility of not having all the information available is why I'm still skeptical. It wouldn't be the first time someone's claimed to have been falsely punished only to find out later that their presented evidence was a sham all along.
 
> Sidenote: I didnt downvote you idk who did but ill upvote it back to 1.

I like to remove the auto-upvote from my posts to get a better idea of how many people like or dislike my posts. It's not perfect I know but it's something at least.

I didnt even know you can remove the auto upvote. Ill probably look into doing that myself.

Edit: I just found it odd he didnt say what those last 3 lines meant. And someeone had to report him to trigger the system. I dont think anyone on the enemy team would do it without him making triggering comments towards this (the 2 lol replies) and if it was someone on his team there would have to be a reason behind the report especially if he makes that comment at the end of getting his ez banned, which then it wouldnt be his team was having fun with him. Thats just my 2 sense tho but we would know more from a vod or unedited riot support response as you mentioned.

What? I have explained everything in other comments. 

makeemrun: if this kata didn't ban my ez i would be as fed as heca :')

I explained that the Katarina on my team banned Ezreal in champion select for some reason, and a little while before we won and were ahead a lot I typed that. Because I like playing Ezreal when I get ADC. 

makeemrun: yes, i do

After the comment above my support asked me ''you really like ez that much'' which I replied 'yes, i do' 


makeemrun: go solo baron

I wanted to see if Hecarim could solo baron before we won as he was superfed. He then said he didn't have the right build for it, as he had little to no lifesteal. 

There you go. Explained.
There is literally nothing to hide. I am confident I have been wronged in this case and that the support ticket I sent will help me sort this out :)

So around two hours ago I got an e-mail from Riot Support. My ban is lifted, honor is reset. All is well. Thanks everyone for your comments and attention, including those who thought I was guilty. :)

	
Splínter (Riot Games - LoL Support)

Jan 16, 11:40 AM PST

Hey there,

Thanks for paying us a visit! I hope your day is going great!

I've taken a look at the situation and it seems that there was an error in our system. Since this was the case, I went ahead and lifted the suspension for you.

We have also reverted your honor level to what it was before.

I highly apologize for the inconvenience created.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,

Don't click here.

Splinter - Player Support Specialist

> [{quoted}](name=makeemrun,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2020-01-16T22:08:32.320+0000)

Ah, so it was a rare false positive after all. While I don't disagree with me and some others being skeptical (as I hope you can understand) I am at least glad you were able to get your ban lifted and honor restored. Best of luck in your future games.
Of course, anyone can lie on the internet.  :) Thanks!

You should submit a support ticket and ask for a manual review (request a human) and contest your punishment.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
I will try that, thank you

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-15T00:30:34.015+0000)

Your name> . a reason i got banned for mis-spelling "poppy" . I swear it was a mistake....this is so sad it's funny.
My name is 'make them run' shortened.

Ridiculous reason for a ban. Of course, you could be hiding stuff, yada yada.
But even listing this chatlog as a reason for your ban is ridiculous.
You took the Lord's name in vain... you'll deal with that at your final judgment, but you werent flaming anyone, just general comments...
Pretty silly. I hope I don't get punished when I type:
"what the fucking hell"
after i get run over by a tank with no damage items (ahem Mundo)
Completely agree. The context I typed it in was in a funny manner where a teammate failed hard and the whole team found it funny. Considering disabling chat permanently. This is crazy.

Another thing. Most games start in good humour. People making jokes about sexy character skins. Using swear words liberally. Etc. But what if someone gets salty after and reports. Without context all that's seen is bad words and edgy humour

Another thing that worries me is if my opponent makes a laughably bad play. I'll type idiots in tram chat. My oppnonets don't see it and my teammates can laugh at the play with me, boosting team morale.what if we get desotryed later on and someone gets toxic . Can I get banned because typing idiots early on has zero context by itself?
Exactly. That's when I wrote 'jesus ****ng christ' after my Kata failed hard, the whole team laughed and everyone was in good spirits.
Yeah it doesn't really seem that bad, at least not when compared to other things that bring on the 14 day ban. Maybe the support ticket will give better insight or be able to reverse it.
I did send a ticket just now, I only hope I won't get an automated response.

The truth is that the IFS is a CROCK OF SHIT. No matter how much they tell this brazen lie about number of reports not mattering, this outright false. It doesn't matter what you type, if multiple people just don't like you and/or false report you, then you will be at high risk of getting (unfairly) punished.

And their """support""" team has no interest in actually supporting whatsoever, they are simply Rito's little lapdogs that will damage control any punishment given to you and try to justify anything this little poorly programmed IFS robot does when it can be easily abused or exploited. The support doesn't care if you weren't toxic or the punishment is absurd given the action, they will simply take any little thing that could ever possible be interpreted as negative, cynical, critical, passive aggressive, rude, or complaining and go "yep, you deserved it, tough shit"

It's such a joke.

> [{quoted}](name=Ellatiel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-01-15T01:39:09.752+0000)

> The truth is that the IFS is a CROCK OF SHIT. No matter how much they tell this brazen lie about number of reports not mattering, this outright false. It doesn't matter what you type, if multiple people just don't like you and/or false report you, then you will be at high risk of getting (unfairly) punished.
> 
> And their """support""" team has no interest in actually supporting whatsoever, they are simply Rito's little lapdogs that will damage control any punishment given to you and try to justify anything this little poorly programmed IFS robot does when it can be easily abused or exploited. The support doesn't care if you weren't toxic or the punishment is absurd given the action, they will simply take any little thing that could ever possible be interpreted as negative, cynical, critical, passive aggressive, rude, or complaining and go "yep, you deserved it, tough shit"
> 
> It's such a joke.

This coming from the person who refused to discuss game 1 of their punishment in [either of ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EKKbpial-umm-excuse-me-riot-25-game-chat-restriction-for-simply-saying-9x-ifs-working-as-intended)[their threads](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/blEEIP9O-riot-ifs-bugs-out-and-falsely-punish-me-i-demand-answers-punished-for-saying-two-characters-9x) and insisted on only discussing (and complaining about) game 2 instead.

It's not that people don't want to help but rather they're less inclined to do so when a person actively prevents them from helping by intentionally withholding information just to fit ones own narrative (like you've done). Understand that it's a two-way street. If a person is unwilling to provide all the information they have (and thus let others help them) then they really have no business claiming that X doesn't work or claim that people aren't helping them out.
Gottem. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
you know that no name and shame rule applied to everything you post on this board, not just thread you started?
Let me guess - you had a chat restriction recently?
No. I started playing again in late october/early november after not playing since 2017. The last time I had chat restriction I think was 5 years ago

Except the OP didn't flame at all? Unless you count "jesus fucking christ" as flaming, which is just a more elaborate way to say "fuck". And people don't get banned just for saying "fuck" once a game, unless something drastically changed recently.
Seriously, if this shit is ban worthy then we might as well all permanently disable chat because a slightest slip will get us banned. This chat log is mostly calls to their team and a single swear line.

Sure. If you think this is a "slightest slip", fine. This isn't though.

This is someone using chat for negativity, giving up, and being aggressive towards teammates.
Ah yes, such aggressiveness as "don't shove please" or "loooool". IFS must have had a stroke and its hardware burned down from such egregiously foul language.
You consider 5 years recent? Lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Flawless Fetus,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2020-01-15T12:37:05.686+0000)
>
> You consider 5 years recent? Lol.

While i disagree with ruj's stance here, 5 years could be recent if you havnt played much in those 5 years. The system likely has very little influence from time, and almost all of it from games played.

As I said in other comments, I was and recently, became an avid player. I played a lot in the timespan early 2015- late 2017. Almost three years without a ban or chat restriction. Also, since I started playing again in october, I've played 300+ games without any ban or restriction.

> [{quoted}](name=makeemrun,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=000100000000000100000000,timestamp=2020-01-15T19:27:02.604+0000)

> As I said in other comments, I was and recently, became an avid player. I played a lot in the timespan early 2015- late 2017. Almost three years without a ban or chat restriction. Also, since I started playing again in october, I've played 300+ games without any ban or restriction.

My reply to them has nothing to do with the thread, just clarification on that one bit in particular. And like i said, i completely disagree with ruj's assessment anyway.
Fair enough :)

A bit late to the battle, but I'm glad this is resolved. I don't even know what was supposed to be toxic in this chatlog, and if that truly warranted a 14-day ban then every LoL player who has chat enabled would be banned.

Anyway, nice to see support can be helpful and understanding. I hope this doesn't happen again.
Looks fine to me. Since you're already contesting it, I wish you the best of luck OP. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
someone was having a bad day and decided to report u .  they r the worst scum.

dont type "EZ" ever, because the system think you are shorthand typing "easy".  Its a ridiculous but the automated system finds this to be slightly negative.  Never type "gg" "ggwp" or "ff" 3 or more times in a game this is also a trigger if you do this often (I know this didnt happen here, but just be aware).  The system also hates one word, quickly typed sentences.  So if you type one word and hit enter very fast.  The system will assign this a small negative value (I think it considers it spam).    

Anyway, just assume your teammates are going to report you every single game you are losing.  As you can see the automated system is a mess and always has been.  You will probably get this overturned if you didn't hide anything.  But, just be aware the system is hyper sensitive and to just avoid typing at all.  Typing baron is up or lets fight for drake.  Obviously, not going to trigger.  BUT, saying anything ironic, joking or not.  too risky in snowflake meta.
Ye it's pretty crazy. In that context it is pretty obvious Ezreal is the meaning of 'ez'. Really disliking this, considering turning 'chat scale' ingame to the minimum value.

> [{quoted}](name=makeemrun,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YYcKx1W3,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2020-01-15T19:20:45.661+0000)
>
> Ye it's pretty crazy. In that context it is pretty obvious Ezreal is the meaning of 'ez'. Really disliking this, considering turning 'chat scale' ingame to the minimum value.

OP I would recommend ignoring those who say "don't type cause of snowflakes", as most people who say that have been validly punished by the system and are still upset about it. Because of that they often look for any perceived error in the system as evidence for it being broken or whatever and accuse any who say otherwise as being a "sensitive snowflake" or "insert insult here". Your case may just be an example of a very rare false positive assuming you're being 100% truthful*, hence why they're latching onto it as "proof" of a flawed and broken system.

There's nothing wrong with bantering with others provided you don't take it too far and know when to stop. In some of my games I talk quite a bit, sometimes even joking around with my teammates and I have yet to receive any kind of punishment whatsoever. When it comes to "Ez" the IFS is smart enough to know the difference between the champion name and other uses. For example, "ggez" is considered unsportsmanlike & can contribute to a possible punishment if there's other more problematic behavior displayed, though rarely on its own. On the flipside, "gj ez" wouldn't be considered bad on its own.

Also when it comes to cussing, it only becomes a problem when directed at others, which you didn't do in this case.

Just wait for the Support ticket to finish up then post it here in its unedited entirety. Hopefully then we can figure out what's really going on here.

*Forgive my skepticism, but since people have been known in the past to lie about and/or even withhold, edit and/or make up information about their cases in order to fit their own narrative I have to take cases like this with a grain of salt.
I posted screenshots of the chat logs. There's nothing to hide. I am confident I have been wronged in this case and that I will get sufficient help from the support ticket I sent.:)
Just post the game then?

Coming from a guy that has 19 permabanned accounts, this is indeed weak sauce.

This definitely doesn't deserve to be banned, I think the "fuck" + report = punishment. Riot really do be like that.
next time you will get a perma ban. And chat log must be from 3 games. you didnt show us all chat logs...
They only gave me the one game as an example of bad behaviour. Check the imgur link.
